scripts.docker:clean:images: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $imgs = docker images felipergrosa/whaticket-frontend -q; if ($imgs) { $imgs | ForEach-Object { docker rmi -f $_ } }; $imgs2 = docker images felipergrosa/whaticket-backend -q; if ($imgs2) { $imgs2 | ForEach-Object { docker rmi -f $_ } }"
scripts.docker:prebuild: npm run docker:clean:images && npm run docker:clean:builder
scripts.docker:build:all: npm run docker:prebuild && npm run docker:build:frontend && npm run docker:build:backend
scripts.docker:push:all: npm run docker:push:frontend && npm run docker:push:backend
scripts.docker:deploy:clean: npm run docker:build:all && npm run docker:push:all
scripts.docker:deploy:backend: npm run docker:prebuild && npm run docker:build:backend && npm run docker:push:backend
scripts.docker:deploy:backend:fast: npm run docker:build:backend:fast && npm run docker:push:backend
scripts.docker:deploy:fast: npm run docker:build:frontend:fast && npm run docker:build:backend:fast && npm run docker:push:all
